subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: With the Canadiens in a 0-2 hole against the Rangers in the Eastern Conference finals and with loss of goalie Carey Price to an injury, Quebecers are straining to find reasons for optimism.
snippet: With the Canadiens in a 0-2 hole against the Rangers in the Eastern Conference finals and with loss of goalie Carey Price to an injury, Quebecers are straining to find reasons for optimism.
